DOC.brief_summary: This study will describe the epidemiology including prognosis of heart failure related to treatment with anthracycline and trastuzumab for breast cancer. In a prospective study Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2) positive breast cancer patients scheduled for trastuzumab treatment at Odense University Hospital, will be offered advanced echocardiographic examination, test of bio-markers and genetic markers for the purpose of investigating if early identification of patients in particular risk of developing heart failure is feasible.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Toxicity in Medical Treatment of Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of HER2 positive breast cancer Adjuvant treatment with trastuzumab Left ventricle ejection fraction (LVEF) <50% Chronic or persistent atrial fibrillation History of moderate or severe valvular heart disease.
DOC.keyword: Heart failure related to medical treatment of breast cancer
